modName: Eyes of Niteo- Custom made eyes -PREVEIW-
summary:
THE EYES OF NITEO
This is a preview for the Eyes of Niteo mod which adds completely different eye textures for wood elves.There are Evil/demonic eyes to realistic eyes to more fantasy type eyes. Its a complete selection of personal preference I hope to complete soon.
descriptionHtml:
The Eyes of Niteo is a mod being made to give Skyrim a more \"Fantasy\" feel. The eyes are hi res,made individually,unique,and Illuminating. Please leave comments,concerns or ideas if you so please, it would be a tremendous help. This is my first mod but hopefully it has a big impact.

ONLY AVAILABLE FOR WOOD ELVES FOR THE TIME BEING 

Eyes of Niteo

--------------------------------------------------------------
Contents
--------------------------------------------------------------
Eyes of Niteo
Eyes of Malice
more coming soon

--------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION
--------------------------------------------------------------
<=-BE SURE TO BACK UP THE ORIGINAL FILES-=>

Just drag and drop into your Data files and replace old files with the new ones

--------------------------------------------------------------
UNINSTALLATION
--------------------------------------------------------------
Simply take the back up files of the old eye.dds files and copy them over, and replace.


--------------------------------------------------------------
\\\\\\=-REMINDER-=///
--------------------------------------------------------------
THIS IS ONLY A PREVIEW
There are many more on the way but for the moment this is all I have.




Please enjoi!

				~Avellix
author: Avellix
